Justo está muy agradecido con los prestamistas de Kiva, ya que con su gran apoyo él comprará un artefacto (cocina) para cubrir algunas necesidades en su hogar y distribuirá otra parte del dinero en gastos para de la casa, de esta manera él y su familia sentirán mayor comodidad y podrá seguir trabajando con ese gran entusiasmo que lo caracteriza y así cumplir su sueño: “Brindar un mejor nivel de vida a su familia”.
texts.en:
Justo lives in Camaná with his 6 children and his grandchildren. This man has been an entrepreneur for a long time. He works as a driver to help his family.  

He is a very responsible man and a fighter. He doesn't care if he has to walk at night and come home when it's almost morning. He just wants his grandchildren to be happy. 

Justo is very grateful to the Kiva lenders. With their big help, he will buy an appliance to serve some needs in the home and he will use another part of it for household expenses. This way, he and his family will be more comfortable and he can keep working enthusiastically like he always has and make his dream come true: to offer a better quality of life to his family.

loans.use: to pay for household expenses and to buy appliances.

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.es:
Gregorio de 54 años de edad, estudio hasta 4º grado, es casado, su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene 3 hijos, dos de ellos están trabajando y uno está estudiando. El cliente se dedica a la agricultura y a la cría de cerdos, este trabajo lo aprendió por medio de su padre quien le inculco desde pequeño, el cultivo queda a 40 minutos de su casa y viaja a pie. 

El préstamo lo utilizara para cultivar 7,000 metros cuadrados de maíz, comprara semilla, fertilizantes, herbicidas y pagara la mano de obra empleada. Él sueña que su cultivo se desarrolle en buenas condiciones y tener un buen rendimiento productivo.
texts.en:
Gregorio is 54 years old and studied through the fourth grade. He is married and his wife takes care of the household duties. They have three children, two of whom are working while the other one is studying. Gregorio is a farmer, but he also raises pigs. He learned this line of work from his father, who got him involved at a young age. Gregorio’s crops are located 40 minutes away from his house, so he must travel by foot.

This loan will be used for cultivating 7,000 square meters of corn. Gregorio will buy seeds, fertilizers, herbicides, as well as pay for labor. His dream is to have his crop develop under good conditions so that he can achieve a productive yield.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, herbicides, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Gita

texts.en:
Gita lives in a remote village, South Mouyamari, in Maynaguri in the district Jalpaiguri. She is 38 years old, married and is a housewife.  She lives with her husband and two sons in their own house.  Both Gita and her husband Dulal are illiterate and can only sign their names, but they are providing education to both their sons. The elder one is in college and the younger is studying in Grade 9.

Gita's husband runs his agricultural business, where he cultivates different kinds of crops and vegetables. Dulal sells vegetables and crops in the market and in his neighborhood after the harvest. Gita, though a housewife, helps her husband with his work, after managing her household work.  Now she wants to start her own piggery business. She has chosen this piggery business as it is a profitable one and pork is in  great demand in the local market. 

Gita will sell the pigs when they are grown. She needs some capital, thus she applied for a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to buy pigs and piglets to start her new piggery business and generate more revenue. She hopes that, with BJS and Kiva's cooperation, she can grow her business and can give sufficient financial sustenance to her family, and a good education to her sons.

She is highly obliged to Kiva and BJS.

loans.use: To purchase pigs to start her new piggery business.

loans.name: Al- Zohour** Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al- Zohour** and it consists of four ladies who live in Sana'a, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 160,000 YER from AMB.

Rasha is a hardworking woman. She is a 39-year-old married woman with eight children and  lives with her family in Sana'a. She is the leader of the group. Rasha studied till Elementary school, but she couldn't complete her studies. Rasha started her business selling women's clothes and accessories door to door more than five years ago. She started her business with a small amount of working capital, thanks to the assistance of her husband who supported her financially. 

Year by year her business has improved, but most of what she earns in profits goes to the expenses of the family. She has good experience in this business. Unfortunately, the income of this business is not enough to enlarge her business, and she wants to improve it. For this reason, she applied for a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase more women's clothes and accessories and sell them to her customers.

Rasha looks forward to expanding her business more in order to provide her family with a lot of money.

loans.use: to purchase more women's clothes and accessories for resale

loans.name: Immaculate

texts.en:
Hello, world!  Meet Immaculate, a farmer living on a small piece of land in Muranga. She sells tea, coffee and vegetables from her farm to earn a living; she also has a retail business in the area where she sells groceries. She has been doing farming for the past seven years. With the experience she has gotten from farming, she has gotten very good returns out of it. Her biggest challenge is lack of enough capital to expand her farm and venture into other projects.

Immaculate wants to venture into pig farming and so she wants a loan for purchasing pigs. This pigs will add to her income because she will begin selling pork products which have a major demand in Kenya. “The income increase will ensure that  my family gets all the necessary items,” says Immaculate.

loans.use: to purchase pigs.

loans.name: Jayshree

texts.en:
Jayshree, 34 years old, is a married woman and mother of one son.  She is from the rural village Debinagar of Maynaguri in the district Jalpaiguri. Her son goes to school and is in class IV (Grade 4).  Both she and her husband Shyamal are graduates.  He runs a fish business.

Jayshree's husband was the only earner in the family.  It was tough for Jayshree to manage her household needs with the small income of her husband.  Therefore, she decided to help her husband with her earnings.  For this purpose, she started her business of selling Saris. Saris are garments consisting of a length of cotton or silk elaborately draped around the body, traditionally worn by the women of India. 

Jayshree started her business from her house. She is taking the loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to buy different varieties of saris from the wholesale market and to fulfill the demand of her customers.  Her neighbors, relatives and friends are her main customers.  Now she is playing an important role by giving financial support to her family. With the growing needs of her family and the increasing educational expenses of her child, she stared her business to give financial support to her family. Jayshree is a successful entrepreneur. She expects a boost in her earnings with her loan and her plans are to use the profit of her business for the betterment of her family members and also go ahead with her business.

She is grateful to BJS and Kiva for this loan.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of saris to expand her sari business.

loans.name: Iván Fabricio

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Santa Gema se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Tarqui  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive el señor Iván, tiene  23 años de edad, está soltero y vive con la mamá. El estudia en una universidad de la localidad.
Don Iván es un joven muy trabajador que le gusta salir adelante a través del trabajo honrado pensando en un mejor porvenir, el se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa y en la universidad donde estudia ya que sus compañeros de clase son sus mejores clientes, Trabaja todos los días en los ratos que esta desocupado, deja a crédito a sus clientes  y cobra cada quince días. Su mercadería  la va a comprar a  Guayaquil cada quince días o al mes de acuerdo a lo que necesite. Tiene un año que se dedica a esta actividad con la cual saca adelante sus estudios
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas y camisetas. Está en el Grupo De Crédito desde hace 3 años  y le gusta porque empezó su negocio con uno de los créditos. Sus sueños es terminar sus estudios.
texts.en:
The credit group Santa Gema meets every 15 days in the Tarqui neighborhood in the city of Manta, known as a city of unparalleled beauty with many attractions and beautiful beaches that are visited year round.

Mr. Iván is a single 23-year-old man. He lives in Manta with his mother and studies at the local college. 

Mr. Iván is a hardworking young man who likes to get ahead through honest work and thoughts about a better future. He sells all kinds of clothes door-to-door, at his home, and at his university, where he sells to classmates who are his best customers. He works every day in these free moments, allowing his customers to pay on credit and charges them every 15 days. He buys his merchandise from Guayaquil every 15 days or once per month depending on his needs. He has been selling clothes for one year which he does to advance his studies.

This loan will be used to buy more merchandise such as pants, blouses, and shirts. He has been with the credit group for 3 years and he likes it because he began his business with one of the loans. His dream is to finish his studies.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses and shirts.

loans.name: Ezra

texts.en:
Ezra is a 53-year-old married male with four children, two of whom go to school. 

He is a sub-county chief, and he has served for 26 years. He also farms to supplement his income. He joined the service to earn a living, and he suits his profession. 

Ezra has good character, however, under payment is a challenge he has. He has a vision of educating his children. 

He is requesting a loan to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay for school fees for his children.

loans.name: Bernardina

texts.es:
La socia Bernardina sigue dedicándose a la agricultura, a la vez la socia se dedica a la crianza de animales, la socia cría a sus animalitos para luego venderlos en las distintas ferias que se realizan, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para comprar alimentos y abono.
La socia se siente agradecida con el crédito y se compromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Bernardina continues to engage in agriculture. At the same time, she raises small animals so that she can sell them at the different fairs that take place. Bernardina wants to continue working so that she can help her family get ahead.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy animal feed and compost. Bernardina is grateful for the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and compost.

loans.name: Jesusa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN MARTIN DE ZURITE”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Zurite, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Jesusa; La socia se dedica a la ganadería y agricultura, la socia a la vez continua dedicándose al negocio de venta de productos secos, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de abono y fertilizantes.
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the San Martin de Zurite communal bank.  The bank is located in the Zurite district, which belongs to the Anta province in the Cusco department.

The member's name is Jesusa.  She devotes herself to livestock and agriculture.  At the same time, she continues to work in the business of selling dry products.  She is a responsible and diligent person.  She wishes to be able to continue working in order to continue supporting her family in this way.

Jesusa is requesting the loan to purchase compost and fertilizers.

She is happy about the loan, and she is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to purchase compost and fertilizers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchasing more cooking oil, rice, and cooking seasonings to expand her business.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
La socia Maria Elena sigue dedicándose al negocio de compra y venta de leche, la socia continua criando a sus vacas para luego venderlas en las ferias que se realizan por la zona, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de una vaca.
La socia se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Maria Elena is continuing in her business buying and selling milk.  She is continuing to raise her cows for later resale in markets in her area.  She wants to be able to continue working in this way and to keep supporting her family.

She is seeking a loan so that she can purchase a cow.

She is grateful for the loan opportunity and promises to make her repayments on schedule.

loans.use: to purchase a cow.

loans.name: Marlene Lisbeth

texts.es:
Marlene Lisbeth es una joven de 32 años, madre de dos niños en edad escolar, habita en el municipio de El Sauce donde nació y creció, ahora tiene su propia familia la que procreó con un Sauceño.
Desde hace más de diez años se dedica a laborar como maestra de primaria en una comarca ubicada a 15 kilómetros de dicho municipio donde tiene que viajar en autobús y en época de invierno se les dificulta el acceso por los fangales que ocasionan las lluvias, por lo que tienen que caminar largas horas.
Este sacrificio lo hace por la necesidad de su trabajo por ayudar a su esposo en los gastos del hogar.
Está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de cerámica, bondex y pago de mano de obra con el objetivo de seguir mejorando su casa, ya que gracias a estos préstamos hoy tiene mejores condiciones de vida ella y su familia y con la ayuda de Dios espera llegar a tener una larga relación crediticia con los inversionistas de kiva y Ceprodel para cumplir su sueño de llegar a tener una casa amplia.
texts.en:
Marlene Lisbeth is a young woman of thirty-two years, mother of two school age children, and lives in the municipality of El Sauce where she was born and raised.  She now has her own family which she created with a man from El Sauce.  

For more than 10 years, she has been making a living as a primary school teacher in a region located 15 kilometers from her municipality to which she 
has to travel by bus.  During the wintertime, road access is difficult because of the mud brought on by the rains and because of which they have to walk for long hours.

She makes this sacrifice due to her necessity to work to help her husband with the household expenses.

She is requesting a loan to buy tile and Bondex and cover the labor costs in order to improve her house given that thanks to these loans today she and her family have better living conditions. With the help of God, she hopes to have a long credit relationship with the investors of Kiva and Ceprodel in order to complete her dream of having an ample house.

loans.use: to buy tile and Bondex and to pay the labor costs

loans.name: Claudia Elena

texts.es: Claudia de 40 años de edad vive en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus 4 hijos (de 19, 17 y 15 años de edad y el último de 9 meses de edad). El esposo de Claudia es albañil independiente, ella (Claudia) trabaja de lunes a viernes en un Kinder cerca de su vivienda. Una de las labores de Claudia en el Kinder es de preparar los alimentos que se entrega a cada escolar. Los fines de semana Claudia sigue trabajando y estos días los dedica al lavado y planchado de ropa ajena. Claudia a solicitado un crédito a FUSAI para comprar las ventanas y puertas de su vivienda, también construirá una pared interna de bloque para dividir una habitación. Por lo que comprará con el dinero del crédito ladrillo de bloque, arena, grava, hierro, cemento. La mano de obra estará a cargo de su esposo.
texts.en: Claudia is 40 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and four children, (ages 19, 17, 15, and the youngest is 9 months old).  Claudia’s husband is an independent mason and she works Monday through Friday at a kindergarten near her home.  One of Claudia’s jobs at the kindergarten is to prepare the food for the kids.  Claudia continues to work on the weekends, washing and ironing clothes for others.  Claudia is asking for a loan, through FUSAI to buy doors and windows for her home.  She will also build an internal cinder block wall to divide her house.  She will use the money to buy cinder blocks, sand, gravel, iron bars, and cement.  Her husband will be in charge of the labor.

loans.use: to build a wall.

loans.name: Nicholas

texts.en:
Nicholas is 28 years old. He is married, and together they have been blessed with one child. 

He has been running a motorcycle transport business. Currently, he makes an estimated monthly income of 22,360 KES.

Nicholas would like to buy spare parts for repairing his motorcycle. He has applied for a loan of 30,000 KES to buy spare parts for repairing his motorcycle. Through this loan, he will be able to offer proper services that will increase his income. 

He has successfully repaid his previous loan.

loans.use: to buy spare parts to repair his motorcycle

loans.name: Cruz Mireya

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Santa Gema se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Tarqui  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Cruz, tiene 42 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos mayores de edad, uno de ellos estudia en universidad. Su esposo es comerciante.
Doña Cruz y su esposo tienen una  tienda de víveres en su casa, allí venden todo tipo de productos como granos, aceites, detergentes, embutidos, legumbres, frutas, carnes, aguas en bidón, sodas, artículos de bazar y papelería, entre otras cosas,  trabajan todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 21h00 y a veces hasta más tarde si algún cliente desea de algún producto, llevan más de diez años con este negocio que les permite salir adelante y el cual lo empezaron con uno de los créditos que recibieron, ella está muy agradecida con la institución ya que gracias a los créditos cada día mejoran mas su calidad de vida.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, embutidos y otros productos para surtir su negocio. Lleva 12 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con un crédito empezó su negocio. Sus sueños son seguir mejorando su tienda.
texts.en:
The Santa Gema communal bank meets every 15 days in the Tarque neighborhood in the city of Manta.  The city is known for its beautiful beaches, which are visited by many during all seasons of the year.  It is known for being a city of unrivaled beauty with a lot of tourist attractions.

This is where Cruz, age 42, lives.  She is married, and they have two grown children.  One of them attends the university.  Her husband is a merchant.

Cruz and her husband have a food store at their house.  They sell all types of products like grains, cooking oils, detergent, cold cuts, vegetables, fruits, meats, bottled water for dispensers, sodas, housewares, and stationery items, among other things.  They work every day from 6:00 a.m. until 9:00 p.m.  Sometimes they work later if a customer wants some product.  They have been in this business for ten years, and it allows them to get ahead.

They started the business with one of the loans they got.  She is very grateful to the institution.  Thanks to the loans, their quality of life improves more each day.  She will use this loan to stock her store more.  She will buy rice, sugar, cooking oil, detergent, cold cuts, and other products to stock her business.  

She has been in the communal bank for 12 years.  She likes it because she started her business with a loan.  Her dream is to continue improving her store.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, cooking oil, detergent, cold cuts, and other products to stock her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchasing more fish to expand her business

loans.name: Razia

texts.en:
Razia is a 55-year-old woman, residing in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is a mother of five children. 

Her husband has been running a general store for many years. He is solely responsible for fulfilling the needs of his entire family. Razia's husband wants to purchase different kinds of commodities (e.g., rice, sugar, tea bags, milk, and other consumer items) for his business purpose. But, due to financial constraints, he is not in a suitable position to buy all these products for reselling purposes. 

Therefore, Razia has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner, BRAC Pakistan. This loan will enable her husband to buy all these commodities and also help him to earn maximum profitable income to manage his household and business. 

Razia is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy different types of commodities for her husband's general store.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es: Alberto es una persona de 41 años de edad, vive con su familia en el municipio de Sololá, departamento de Sololá, tiene 6 hijos; 5 hombres y 1 mujer, se dedica a cultivar papa, zanahoria y cebolla, los vende en el mercado del municipio, se dedica al cultivo porque en el  lugar donde vive hay abundante agua y todo el año se pasa cultivando, también trabaja por jornales con sus vecinos y le paga por día trabajado, Alberto solicita un crédito por un monto de Q. 2,500.00 para comprar insumos para el cultivo de papa (semilla de papa, abono orgánico, fertilizante y otros) con las ganancias que obtenga de los cultivos piensa construir ambientes de su casa para que vivan sus hijos.
texts.en: Albero is 41 years old and lives with his family in Solola, within the Solola department.  He has six children; five sons and one daughter and raises potatoes, carrots, and onions that he sells in the town market.  He farms because there is plenty of water in the place where he lives and he farms year round.  He also works as a farm hand for his neighbors and they pay him every day.  Alberto is asking for a loan in the amount of Q. 2,500 to buy supplies for potatoes (seeds, compost, fertilizer, and other things.).  He will build the surrounding in his home so that his children can live there.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase food containers, plates, and cups to expand her business.

loans.name: Pati Ibed

texts.es:
La socia Pati Ibed  se dedica a la ganaderia, la socia cría a sus animales para luego venderlos a sus clientes y en las ferias que se realizan por la zona, a la vez la socia continua dedicándose al negocio de compra y venta de maíz la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta manera seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de un toro.


La socia se siente agradecida con el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Pati Ibed makes her living in livestock. She raises her animals in order to resell them to her customers in the markets in her area. At the same time she is continuing in her business buying and selling corn. 

She is a responsible and diligent person. She wishes to be able to continue working and supporting her family. She is seeking a loan in order to purchase a bull. She is grateful for the loan and promises to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to purchase a bull.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for tuition fees

loans.name: Aileen

texts.en:
Aileen prepares and sells a variety of snack foods/items in the local community. Aileen has been in her business for three years, and with he earnings, she was able to put up a grocery store. With her generated revenue, she was able to repay her previous loan successfully, used for buying raw ingredients.

Aileen always finds ways to improve her business. Without hesitation, she took a new loan to purchase more grocery goods .She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery goods.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more wood for resale.

loans.name: Jagannath Shg Group

texts.en:
Sapta, the lady standing with her hand raised in the photo, is a very active woman who is 41 years of age. She resides in a small house with her husband and two children in a rural village in Bargarh district in Odisha, India. For the last 12 years, Sapta has been running a general grocery shop in her small house with items like soap, shampoo, washing powder, sugar, tea, oil, etc. She started the business with a small investment of her own. At that time, her monthly net income was around 3,000 INR. It was very difficult on her part to maintain the family. So she, along with eleven other women from her village, formed a self-help group named "Jagannath SHG" to access loans from People's Forum. 

As per the statement of Sapta, she is currently earning 6,000 INR per month but this small income is not at all sufficient to manage the family along with educational expenses of her children, so she wants to increase her income by expanding her existing business. She plans to use the loan to purchase items like rice, wheat, lentils, oil, soap, potatoes, etc. in bulk for her general store. This will help to reduce her purchasing and transportation costs, as she will replenish her stock less frequently. She hopes that this investment will give her more income and enough savings so that she will be able to construct a house for her family, which is a dream for her, and give a better education to her son. The other members of the group are running milk selling, fruit and flower selling and vegetable vending businesses.

loans.use: To purchase items like rice, wheat, lentils, oil, soap, and potatoes in bulk

loans.name: Bertha Katherine

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Ciudadela Divino Niño se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Divino Niño en la ciudad de Manta, ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Bertha, tiene 22 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y de esta relación tienen un hijo de 1 año.  Su esposo es comerciante.
Doña Bertha es una muy buena esposa que realiza el crédito para que su marido lo utilice en su negocio, el tiene un carro en el cual se dedica a la venta de queso y huevos, todos los días se desplaza a ciertos lugares donde compra el queso y los huevos al por mayor para luego entregar en ciertas tiendas y en el mercado de Tarqui, lleva más de 10 años con esta actividad con la cual saca adelante a su familia de una forma honrada.
Este crédito es para comprar quesosa y huevos. Lleva 3 años  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque así ella le ayuda a su marido con los créditos. Sus sueños es tener un local propio.
texts.en:
The Community Bank Ciudadela Divino Niño meets every 15 days in the neighborhood of Divino Niño in the city of Manta, a city known for its beautiful beaches, which are very popular at all times of the year.  It is also know as a beautiful city with many tourist attractions.

Bertha, who is 22, lives here with her common-law husband and their one-year-old son.  Her husband is a merchant.

She is a very good wife who is seeking the loan so that her husband can use it in his business.  He travels by car and sells eggs and cheese.  Every day he goes to certain places to purchase the cheese and eggs at wholesale, and then he delivers the goods to various shops in the market of Tarqui.  He has been in this business for over 10 years.  This has enabled him to work with dignity and to provide his family with a better life.

This loan is for the purchase of eggs and cheeses.  Bertha has been a member of the community bank for three years, and she likes it because the loans are helpful to her husband.  Their goal is to have their own shop.

loans.use: to buy cheeses and eggs.

loans.name: Noah

texts.en:
Noah is a 42-year-old married man with five children, four of whom are attending school. Noah operates a retail shop and a bar at a busy center. He works six days a week and eleven hours per day, plus does farming as an additional income business. 

John began the business to improve his standard of living. He faces a challenge of inadequate capital, yet his dream is to transform his business into wholesale. 

Noah intends to use the loan to expand his house by constructing a store.

loans.use: to expand his house by constructing a store.

loans.name: Zulema Luzmila

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Ciudadela Divino Niño se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Divino Niño  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Zulema, tiene 48 años de edad, hace varios años su esposo falleció pero de esta relación tiene tres hijos mayores de edad que aún viven en su casa. 
Doña Zulema es una mujer que le ha tocado trabajar duro para sacar adelante a sus hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo y productos de Yanbal (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas), trabaja todos los días más que todo en la mañana ya que a esas horas le resulta más fácil realizar sus recorridos,  también vende en su casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes si necesitan de algún producto, deja a crédito y cobra cada semana, lleva 9 años dedicada a esta actividad con la cual ha sacado a delante a sus hijos. 
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar perfumes, bisutería, cosméticos, cremas y ropa de todo tipo. Está en el Grupo De Crédito desde hace  8 años y le gusta porque con los créditos financia su negocio. Sus sueños es seguir adelante.
texts.en:
The Credit Group Ciudadela Divino Nino meets every 15 days in the Divino Nino neighborhood of the city of Manta, a city known for its beautiful beaches which are visited year-round and as a city of unparalleled beauty with many tourist attractions. 

Zulema, 48, lives in this place.  Several years ago, her husband passed away but from this union there are three grown children who still live in her house.

Zulema is a woman who has had to work hard to help her children get ahead.  She makes a living selling all types of clothing and Yanbal products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes, and women's accessories), she works every day most often in the morning because at this time it is easier for her to make her rounds.  She also sells out of her house where her clients come if they need some product.  She allows credit and collects every week.  She has been making her living for nine years this way by which she has moved forward with her children.  
 
She will use this loan to buy perfumes, jewelry, cosmetics, creams and all types of clothing.  She has be in the credit group for eight years and she likes it because with the loans she finances her business.  Her dream is to forge ahead.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, jewelry, cosmetics, creams, and clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more fish to expand her business.

loans.name: Rahmat

texts.en:
Rahmat is a 28-year-old active borrower of BRAC Pakistan. She is the mother of four children. She and her husband are responsible for supporting the entire family. Rahmat has her own business selling clothing. She has had this business for the past six years and contributes her household's income.

Rahmat needs to buy different types of clothes to sell but due to insufficient capital she cannot buy these clothes for her business. Therefore, she has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan. With the help of this loan, she will be able to purchase enough clothes to fulfill her business needs. She hopes to increase her profit in order to support her family and business.

Rahmat is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan for this financial assistance

loans.use: To buy different types of clothes for her retail business.

loans.name: Zepher

texts.en: Zepher is a 38-year-old  married male with six children, four of whom attend school. He used his previous loan to buy general merchandise to sell, such as soap and match boxes. Zepher still operates his other businesses (a bar and a transport business). He still faces the same challenges of price fluctuations and inadequate capital. Zepher will use this loan to buy salt, sugar, rice and cassava flour to sell.

loans.use: to buy  salt, sugar, rice and cassava flour to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more bags of rice to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cigarettes, bottled water, drinks, and cookies to expand her business.

loans.name: Marrum

texts.en:
Marrum is a 35-year-old woman who resides in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is the mother of four children. Her husband has been running a general store for many years and he responsible for fulfilling the needs of his entire family. Marrum's husband wants to purchase different kinds of commodities like rice, sugar, tea bags, and milk for his business. But due to financial constraints, he is not able to stock all of these products. Therefore Marrum has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan. This loan will enable her husband to buy all these commodities and also help him to generate more income to manage his household and business. 
Marrum is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy different types of commodities for her husband's business.

loans.name: Tasleem

texts.en:
Tasleem, 36 years old, is an active borrower with BRAC Pakistan. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan and is the mother of five children. Tasleem's husband has been working as a wood carpenter for many years, and is the only provider responsible for feeding the entire family and managing the household. 

Tasleem's husband wants to buy  pieces of wood and other tools for his business but due to insufficient financial means, he cannot afford to buy this merchandise. Tasleem has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner, BRAC Pakistan. With the help of this loan, her husband can purchase the relevant items for his business and earn a profitable income to meet the daily needs of his family and business. Tasleem is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy wood and tools for her husband's business

loans.name: Sakina

texts.en:
Sakina, a 35-year-old active borrower with BRAC Pakistan, resides in Rawalpindi, Pakistan with her spouse and two children. Her husband sells various types of flavored ice cream in the local market. He is solely responsible for feeding his entire family and managing the household.

Sakina has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan so that her husband can buy the ingredients needed to make ice cream including milk powder, flavors, dry fruits, etc. These purchases will enable him to increase his sales and earn more income.

Sakina is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy ingredients to make ice cream

loans.name: Juana Francisca

texts.es: Juana de 52 años de edad trabaja como empleada de oficios domésticos. Juana hace algunos años quedó viuda y tuvo que establecerse y continuar su vida en otro municipio. Juana adquirió un terreno en donde hace dos años comenzó a construir su vivienda en la que habita también su hijo, nuera y dos pequeños nietos. Ella tiene el deseo de seguir levando las paredes de la vivienda con ladrillo de bloque; comprar cemento, arena, grava, hierro y el ladrillo de bloque y así sustituir las paredes existentes que están con lámina galvanizada, que como se aprecia en la fotografía ya están deterioradas. Con el crédito que FUSAI le otorgó hará posible dicha mejora a su vivienda y se ha comprometido a pagar las cuotas en el tiempo que el contrato así lo determina.
texts.en:
Juana is 52 years old and works as a housekeeping employee. A few years ago, Juana became a widow so she decided to establish herself in another town where she could continue her life. She acquired a piece of land two years ago and began building a house where she now resides with her son, daughter-in-law, and two small grandchildren.

Juana wants to continue with the construction of the brick walls of her house. She will buy cement, sand, gravel, iron, and bricks. This will replace the existing walls made of galvanized metal sheets, which appear worn out as indicated in the photo. With this loan from FUSAI, Juana will be able to make this improvement to her home. She commits to submitting her payments on time, as determined by her contract.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, iron, and bricks.

loans.name: Aracely Del Rosario

texts.es: Aracely es una joven que lucha por salir adelante con su pequeño negocio de venta de cosméticos, está  estudiando la carrera de medicina profesión con la que espera tener un mejor futuro en la vida, cuenta con el apoyo de su mama quien ve el negocio cuando ella va a clases, Aracely desea invertir en productos como perfumes variados para incrementar su inventario que le permita ofrecer variedad a la clientela.
texts.en:
Aracely is a young woman who strives to get ahead with her small business selling cosmetics.  She's studying medicine, a profession she hopes will give her a better future in life.  She counts on the support of her mother, who watches the business when Aracely is in class.

Aracely wants to invest in products such as a variety of perfumes to increase her inventory so she can offer her customers a selection.

loans.use: to buy perfume for women and men

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a piece of land

loans.name: Jaime Edgar

texts.es:
Jaime vive en la ciudad de nazca, es un hombre con muchas ganas de salir adelante, ya que trabaja con mucho empeño en su trabajo como chofer, el labora alrededor 9 horas al día ya que es su única fuente de ingresos para poder solventar lso gastos de su familia.

Jaime esta agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar materiales de construcción para poder tarrajear las paredes de su vivienda, y de esta manera ir mejorando su calidad de vida y poder seguir esforzandose por hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Darle una vida digna a su familia y terminar de construir su vivienda”.
texts.en:
Jaime lives in the city of Nazca and is a man with a strong desire to get ahead. He works very hard at his job as a driver, putting in 9 hours every day, since this is his only source of income to cover his family's expenses. 

Jaime is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they have offered, he will be able to buy construction materials so he can plaster the walls of his house. This will improve his quality of life and will allow him to continue striving to make his dream a reality: "To give his family a dignified life and finish building his house."

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase food containers, plates and cups to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy palm oil in bulk (by the gallon).

loans.name: Oscar Mario

texts.es: Oscar es un veterano cultivador de café el cual lleva ejerciendo su profesión desde su juventud, el cual presenta una dificultad para seguir operando su admirada profesión y es el alto costo de los abonos, razón por la cual solicita un crédito y lo invertirá todo en compra de abonos para sus tierras que le han dado de comer a su familia conformada por su esposa y tres hijos que no superan la mayoría de edad, su principal sueño es ampliar sus cultivos para sacar una mayor producción mejorando la calidad de vida de su familia y poder contribuir con un grano de café para que todos disfrutemos de una exquisita taza de café al día.
texts.en:
Oscar is a veteran coffee grower who has been in his profession since his youth. He finds it difficult to continue working in this admired profession and one obstacle is the high cost of fertilizers. For this reason Oscar is requesting a loan. He will invest the entire amount in the purchase of compost for his land, which allows him to feed his family that consists of his wife and three children who have not reached adulthood.

Oscar’s main wish is to expand his crops so that he can achieve greater production and improve his family’s quality of life. He also wants to produce coffee beans so that everyone can enjoy an exquisite cup of coffee each day.

loans.use: to buy compost for his land.

loans.name: Hajara

texts.en: This is 28 year-old Hajara. She is married and has 2 children, ages 14 and 10. She has 2 additional dependents who live with her to attend school and also help in the business. In 2004, Hajara established her groundnut, pepper, and tobacco leaf business. She began her business because she had assisted her uncle, who sold these same products. Later, she married to a businessman who taught her what he knew and gave her some money to start her own business. Working 7 days a week and 10 hours a day, she earns about Le 1,894,000 per month. She sells to the general public. She would like a loan of Le 4,000,000. Hajara requires a loan in order to purchase bags of pepper, tobacco leaves of different sizes, and groundnuts. In the future, Hajara plans to educate her children, develop her piece of land, and invest more in her business. This loan will help her achieve her goals. The challenges she normally encounters are the shortage of goods and limited amounts of time to purchase goods at a low price. She is a hard working, honest, and trustworthy businesswoman. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more bags of groundnuts, pepper, and tobacco leaves for resale

loans.name: Khalida

texts.en:
Khalida is a responsible mother of four children. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. For the past 20 years, Khalida's husband has been providing taxi transportation services. He is responsible for fulfilling the needs of the entire family. 

Khalida's husband needs to perform maintenance on his taxi because it is not in good condition and it requires more maintenance costs on a daily basis. Due to insufficient financial means, he is unable to do the necessary maintenance on his taxi. Khalida has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

With the help of this loan, Khalida's husband will easily afford the maintenance costs and be able to provide better transportation services to earn a profitable income. Khalida  also plans to use the profit from her husband's income to make savings to meet her family's needs in the future. Khalida is very grateful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To pay for maintenance expenses for her husband's taxi

loans.name: Flor Alba

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Ciudadela Divino Niño se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Divino Niño  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Flor, tiene 58 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen seis hijos mayores de  edad e independientes. Su esposo es comerciante.
Doña Flor y su esposo se dedican al comercio, ellos tienen una  tienda de víveres en su casa muy bien surtida, allí vende todo tipo de productos como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, legumbres, verduras y frutas, carnes, artículos de bazar y papelería, además de ciertas bebidas y recargas telefónicas, entre otras cosas,  trabajan todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, ya son 10 años con su negocio el cual les permite salir adelante.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, embutidos y otros productos de primera necesidad. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con la ayuda de los créditos mejora su negocio. Sus sueños son seguir mejorando su tienda.
texts.en:
The credit group Ciudadela Divino Niño meets every 15 days in the Divino Niño neighborhood in the city of Manta, a city known for its beautiful beaches that are visited often every season of the year and for being a city with a beauty without equal with many attractive tourist attractions.

Flor lives in this place. She is 58 years old. She is married, and from this relationship she has six adult and independent children. Her husband is a merchant.

Flor and her husband make a living from commerce. They have a grocery store in their home that is very well-supplied. There, they sell all types of products such as rice, sugar, oils, detergents, legumes, vegetables and fruits, meats, stationery products, as well as certain drinks and telephone cards, among other things. They work every day from 6:00 a.m. until 8:00 p.m. and sometimes later. They have already had their business for 10 years, which allows them to come out ahead.

She will use this loan to supply her business more. She is going to purchase rice, sugar, oil, detergents, lunch meats, and other staples. She has been in the credit group from the beginning, and she likes it because with the help of the loans she is improving her business. Her dream is to continue improving her store.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, oil, detergents, lunch meats, and other staples.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en: Jane is a 44-year-old married woman with five children, four of whom are attending school. Jane sells secondhand clothes at a busy center, working 6 days a week and 6 hours a day. She also farms for additional income. Jane began her business to develop her family. She is challenged by competition and high rental costs but her dream is to finish her commercial house. Jane is asking for a loan to buy clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Ximena Del Pilar

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Rostro de Jesús se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Miraflores  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Ximena, tiene 40  años de edad, es madre soltera de una hija de 16 años que estudian en colegio, con ellas vive su mamá que es mayor.
Doña Ximena es una mujer que para sacar adelante a  su hija trabajar muy duro, ella trabaja en un restaurante cerca a una playa de la ciudad donde asisten muchas personas, allí gana un sueldo mensual por su labor pero el dueño del local le da oportunidad a que ella se gane algo extra vendiendo bebidas, ella vende colas y cervezas en este lugar, lleva 7 años dedicada a esta actividad y es así como ella saca adelante a su hija de una forma honrada.
Este  crédito es para comprar cervezas y colas. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos sale adelante sola. Sus sueños son darle lo mejor a su hija.
texts.en:
The Credit Group Rostro de Jesús meets every 15 days in the neighborhood of Miraflores, in the city of Manta. Manta is known for its beautiful beaches which are visited year-round, and for being a city of unequaled beauty with many tourist attractions. This is where Ximena lives.  She is 40 years old and is the single mom of a 16-year-old daughter who is in high school. Ximena's elderly mother lives with them.

Ximena is a woman who works very hard to raise her daughter. She works at a restaurant near a popular beach and earns a monthly salary. But the owner of the restaurant gives Ximena the opportunity to earn some extra money by selling drinks, so she has been selling soft drinks and beer here for 7 years. This is how she is raising her daughter in an honest way. 

This loan is to buy beer and soft drinks. She has been with the Credit Group since its beginning, and she likes it because it allows her to get ahead by herself. Her dream is to give the best to her daughter.

loans.use: to buy beer and soft drinks.

loans.name: Zubada

texts.en:
Zubada is an active borrower of BRAC Pakistan. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Her husband has been providing transport facilities by driving a taxi for many years. He is responsible for fulfilling the needs of the entire family. Her husband needs to do maintenance on his taxi because the current condition of his taxi is not good. It requires more maintenance charges on a daily basis. Due to insufficient financial means he is unable to do maintenance on his taxi. Therefore Zubada has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

With the help of this loan, Zubada's husband can afford the maintenance cost easily and provide better transport facilities to earn a profitable income. Zubada also plans to save the profit amount of her husband's income to meet her family's needs in the future.

Zubada is very grateful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to pay expenses for her husband's taxi maintenance.

loans.name: Salima

texts.en: Salima was born in 1952. She is married and has two adult sons, Mehriddin and Husniddin. Her husband, Lutfullo, is a seller. Salima has been busy with her own business for more than 20 years. Salima sells fabrics. She sells a variety of fabrics for women's clothes. Salima has a selling place in a local market. She needs to renew the assortment of goods every season because she sells seasonable fabrics. Salima is going to buy summer season fabrics but she has not enough money. She is asking for a loan of 10,000 somoni to buy summer season fabrics for the new season. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to buy summer season fabrics for the new season

loans.name: Ana Marister

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Ciudadela Divino Niño se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Divino Niño  en la ciudad de Manta, ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Ana, tiene 40 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos, de 21, 18 y 10 años, dos de ellos estudian en universidad y escuela. Su esposo es taxista.
Doña Ana con la intención de ganar algo por su cuenta y con esto ayudarle a su marido a salir adelante se dedica a la venta de sabanas, cortinas, edredones, entre otras cosas, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes cuando necesitan de algún producto, ella les da facilidades de pagos ya que les da a crédito y  cobra cada ocho o quince días. Son más de 12 años que se dedica a esta actividad con la cual paga los estudios de sus hijos.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar sabanas, edredones y cortinas. Está en el Grupo De Crédito desde el inicio y le gusta por la ayuda que recibe con los créditos. Sus sueños es que sus hijos terminen sus estudios y sean buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
The credit group "Ciudadela Divino Nino" meets every 15 days in the Divino Nino neighborhood, in the city of Manta. The city is known for its beautiful beaches that are visited throughout the year. It's a city with unique beauty with many touristic attractions.
This is where Ana lives, she is 40, married and has three children ages 21, 18 and 10. Two of them study, one in university.  Her husband is a taxi driver.
Hoping to earn something by herself and help her husband get ahead she sells sheets, curtains, comforters and other items, she sells them door to door and also at home where clients go if they need a product.  She gives financing and easy payment terms by collecting every 8 or 15 days.  It's been more than 12 years since she started working on this activity and from it she has been able to pay for her children's studies.
This loan is going to be used to buy sheets, comforters and curtains.  She is part of "Grupo de Credito" and likes the help she gets from the loans.  Her dream is that her children finish their studies and become professionals.

loans.use: to buy sheets, comforters and curtains.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick is a 52-year-old married man with two children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He deals in the motor vehicle transport business, alongside owning rentals to boost his income. 

He faces challenges of competition and poor roads. However, he hopes to educate all his children to higher levels of learning. Patrick needs a loan to buy tyres for his vehicle.

loans.use: To buy tyres for his vehicle.

loans.name: Mwanamisi

texts.en:
Mwanamisi is a married woman with three children,two of whom are in school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

She operates a food-making business, making tea and flat bread (chapatis) for sale to passersby and neighbours. 

With the loan, she wants to purchase food items, such as wheat flour, cooking oil, and sugar, for her business. She dreams of expanding her business to earn more income and establish a restaurant in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase food items, such as wheat flour, cooking oil, and sugar, for her business.

loans.name: Mariga

texts.en:
This is Mariga. She is a hardworking and enterprising woman who has greatly improved her living standards. Besides the retail shop business, Mariga operates a restaurant business.

She is requesting a loan to purchase utensils and food ingredients such as onions, tomatoes, maize flour and wheat flour for her business. She joined Yehu to get financial support.

loans.use: to purchase utensils and food ingredients such as onions, tomatoes, maize flour and wheat flour

loans.name: Mastel

texts.en:
Mastel, 60, is married with five children. He lives in Fort Portal, Uganda. He deals in running rentals and selling milk to earn income. 

He faces challenges of competition and unpredictable weather. He, however, has hopes of providing all his children with a university education. 

Mastel needs a loan to renovate his house by painting it.

loans.use: To renovate his house by painting it.

loans.name: Anderson

texts.es:
Anderson vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, desde hace 5 años se dedica a su labor como agricultor, lo cual le permite poder tener ingresos para poder salir adelante. Anderson ha sembrado maíz hibrido, el cual es un maíz para alimentación de aves.

Anderson esta agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar abono, fertiliznates, acondicionar el terreno, dar mantenimiento al cultivo, entre otros, de esta manear podrá tener una buena cosecha y poder mejorar su ingresos para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener mas hectáreas de cultivo y ser un gran empresario”.
texts.en:
Anderson lives in the city of Pucallpa. For the past five years he has been working as a farmer which allows him to earn money to get ahead. Anderson has grown hybrid corn which is used for bird feed. 

Anderson is grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they have provided, he is able to buy manure, fertilizers, prepare the land, maintain the crops, etc.  This allows for a good harvest and an increase in income so he can realize his greatest dream: "To have more hectares of crops and to be a great businessman."

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizers, and to pay for the upkeep of his crops, etc.

loans.name: Marco Gabriel

texts.es:
Marco vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 4 años, lo cual le ha permitido poder tener ingresos para poder salir adelante y poder solventar los gastos de su hogar; Marco ha sembrado actualmente yuca y también palma aceitera y es por ello que le da mucha responsabilidad a su labor, ya que la agricultura es su única fuente de ingresos.

Marco esta agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá dar mantenimiento a su cultivo de yuca, especialmente comprar abono, fertilizantes, gastos de regadío, mantenimiento de la tierra,, entre otros; de esta manear podrá tener una buena cosecha y podrá mejorar sus ingresos y asi seguir en la lucha de hacer realidad su sueño:” Tener un fundo y mejorar su calidad de vida”.
texts.en:
Marco lives in the city of Pucallpa. He has made a living from agriculture since he was 4 years old, which has allowed him to be able to have an income to be able to come out ahead and be able to pay his home expenses. Marco has currently sown yucca and also oil palm, and it is because of these that he works very responsibly since agriculture is the only source of income.

Marco is thankful to the Kiva lenders since thanks to the help that they have provided to him, he will be able to maintain his yucca crop, especially to purchase compost and fertilizers, and to pay irrigation costs and for land maintenance, among others. In this way, he will be able to have a good crop and he will be able to improve his income and so continue fighting to make his dream a reality: “To have a farm and improve his quality of life.”

loans.use: to purchase compost, fertilizers, and pay for maintenance, among others.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more chains, bracelets and jewellery products to expand her business

loans.name: Emine

texts.en:
Emine is a hardworking divorcee who lives with her three children. Despite all the challenges, she made a new start two years ago and opened a boutique selling women’s clothing. In the summer months, she rents space by the shore and runs a café. She adds the profits to her budget. Emine’s dream is to expand into menswear. With the loan from Maya, she will grow her business to reach her goal. A devoted mother, Emine is working to ensure a good future for herself and her children.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff

Emine Hanım, eşinden ayrılmış, 3 çocuğu ile birlikte yaşayan, çalışkan bir hanım. Hayatına yeni bir başlangıç yaparak, 2 sene önce tüm maddi zorluklara rağmen butiğini açtı ve kadın kıyafetleri satmaya başladı. Yaz aylarında sahilde yer kiralayıp, yeme içme üzerine cafe çalıştırmış, bütçesine katkıda bulunarak verimli kazanç elde etmiş. Büyük hayalleri olan Emine Hanım erkek giyim üzerine de çalışmak istiyor. Maya'dan aldığı kredilerle işini geliştirerek bu amacına ulaşmak istiyor. Fedakar bir anne olan Emine Hanım kendi ve çocukları ile iyi bir gelecek hazırlamak için çalışıyor.

loans.use: to buy menswear

loans.name: Rubirizi Tukwatanise Group

texts.en:
John Bosco is s a resident of Rubirizi and a member of the group. He is businessman who operates a retail shop that sells general merchandise such as  clothing and other household use items as his main source of income, but he also carries out farming, though on a small scale. 

He has applied for a loan through the group partly because he has no form of collateral to help him borrow alone. He will use the loan of 1,000,000 UGX to add in to his business (retail store), and he hopes to pay it back after he has sold the goods and made profits. Though he still faces challenges of limited capital and stiff competition, he is optimistic that these will only be for a short time and with a further financial boost, they will all be history.

His dreams for the future include building a family house for his young family.

loans.use: To buy stocks of shoes for sale

loans.name: Mpeefu Twimukiye Group

texts.en:
Jackson is a male from Uganda, aged 29 years and married with four children aged 12, 8, and 6, and he is a produce dealer in Mpeefu, a local business area. He has been doing the business since 2005 and has reaped much though it's now struggling as a result of limited capital since he is using the income to educate his children.

He has approached Ugafode for a loan of 800,000 UGX through Mpeefu Twimukye group to buy more produce. It's apparently selling cheaply because of the harvest season and he hopes to sell in the near future at a higher price. His limited capital challenges will soon be history if  he keeps getting a financial boost from UGAFODE. 

His dream for the future is to complete his residential house and expand his business. He appreciates UGAFODE for providing affordable loans to the rural poor and Kiva lenders for their unwavering support.The gentleman fourth from the left (back row) in blue is the UGAFODE staff.

loans.use: To buy beans and corn to sell

loans.name: María Valentina

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Rostro de Jesús se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Miraflores  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 28 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de 7 y 2  años, el mayor estudia en escuela. Su esposo es mecánico.
Doña María es una mujer que le gusta ganar lo suyo para así salir adelante, se dedica a la venta de zapatillas por catalogo, realizar sus ventas recorriendo la localidad  donde tiene muchos clientes. Ella también le da parte del crédito a su marido el cual tiene un taller de mecánica automotriz y necesita comprar herramientas, tanto ella como su marido trabajan todos los días ya que es la única manera que tienen para salir adelante. Ella tiene un año que se dedica a esta actividad y su marido mucho más.
Este crédito es para comprar zapatilla y herramientas para el taller mecánico. Está en el Grupo De Crédito desde hace  4 años y le gusta porque con los créditos empezó su negocio. Sus sueños son que su marido tenga un gran taller.
texts.en:
The Rostro de Jesús credit group meets every two weeks in the Miraflores neighborhood of the city of Manta, which is known for its beautiful beaches that are visited year-round and for being a beautiful city with many tourist attractions.  María lives there.  She is 28 years old, married, and has two children who are 7 and 2 years old.  The older child attends school.  Her husband is a mechanic.

María is a woman who likes to earn her own way to succeed.  She works selling shoes by catalog.  She makes her sales in her town, where she has many customers.  She will also give part of the loan to her husband, who has an automotive workshop and needs to purchase tools.  She and her husband work every day since that is the only way they have of succeeding.  She has sold shoes for a year, and her husband has many years of experience.

She will use this loan to purchase shoes and tools for the mechanic shop.  She has been in her credit group for four years and likes it because she was able to start her business with the loans.  Her dream is that her husband has a larger workshop.

loans.use: to purchase shoes and tools.

loans.name: Espiritu Baileti

texts.es:
Espiritu es un hombre con muchas ganas de salir adelante, el se dedica a su trabajo como agricultor desde hace 5 años, actualmente tiene sembrada una hectárea e maíz hibrido, el cual esta en la etapa de germinación, Espíritu le pone mucho empeño a su trabajo, ya que esta es la única fuente de ingresos que tiene parar poder salir adelante.

Espíritu esta agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo el podrá dar manteamiento a su cultivo, comprar abono, fertilizantes, entre otros ; de esta manera pod´ra tener uan buena cosecha y seguir luchando por hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener una mejor calidad de vida”.
texts.en:
Espiritu is a man with much desire to get ahead. He has dedicated himself to his work as a farmer for the last 5 years. At present, he has a hectare planted in hybrid corn, which is now in germination. Espiritu puts much effort into his work, since it is the only source of income he has to help him advance.

Espiritu is grateful for the Kiva investors because, thanks to their help, he will be able to maintain his crop, purchase manure, fertilizers, and other inputs. The result should be a good harvest and the ability to continue the struggle to  make his grand dream a reality: “To have a better quality of life.”

loans.use: to maintain his fields and buy manure, fertilizers, and other inputs.

loans.name: Henry

texts.en:
Henry, aged thirty-nine, lives in Hoima, Uganda. He is married and charged with the responsibility of taking care of five children, three of whom attend school. He deals in the produce business, mostly maize. He also does farming for extra income. He desires to expand his business though weather changes affect his profit margin.

He is acquiring a loan to buy more maize to sell.

loans.use: to buy more maize to sell.

loans.name: Cesar Alejandro

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Ciudadela Divino Niño se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Divino Niño  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive don Cesar, tiene 62 años de edad, está casado y de esta relación tienen seis hijos mayores de  edad e independientes. Su esposa es comerciante.
El señor Cesar y su esposa se dedican al comercio, hace mas de 10 años ellos surtieron una pequeña tienda de víveres en su casa la misma que con el paso de los años han ido mejorando y aun mas desde que recibe los créditos, allí venden todo tipo de productos, como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, legumbres, verduras y frutas, carnes, artículos de bazar y papelería, entre otras cosas,  trabajan todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde. Él toda la vida han trabajo junto a su querida esposa y  es así como han salido adelante.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, embutidos y otros productos de primera necesidad. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda. Sus sueños son seguir mejorando su tienda.
texts.en:
The Ciudadela Divino Niño Credit Group meets every 15 days in the neighborhood of Divino Niño, in the city of Manta. This city is known for its beautiful beaches that are much visited in every season of the year, and for being a city of unequalled beauty, with many tourist attractions.  Don Cesar lives here. He is 62 years old, and married; from this relationship he has six children who are grown up and independent. His wife is a shopkeeper.

Señor Cesar and his wife are shopkeepers. More than 10 years ago they stocked a small grocery store in their house, and through the years it has been improving, especially since they began receiving the loans. They sell all kinds of products, including rice, sugar, oil, detergent, legumes, fruit, vegetables, meat, housewares and stationary. They work every day, from 6:00 A. M. until 8:00 P. M., and sometimes even later.  All his life, he has worked alongside his beloved wife, and this is how they have succeeded.

He will use this loan to add more stock to his store, purchasing rice, sugar, oil, detergent, sausage, and other basic products. He has been in the group since the beginning, and he likes it because of the help it provides. His dream is to continue improving his store.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, oil, detergent, sausage, and other basic products.

loans.name: Bahati

texts.en:
Bahati is a business woman who is very hardworking.She lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. She is married, and has four children, two of whom are in school, one is underage and one is an adult.

Bahati has operated a charcoal selling business for the past fiveyears. Her potential clients are neighbours and passersby. 

With the loan, she wants to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell. 

She decided to join Yehu to access financial support to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.en:
Svetlana, 45, is a widow from the Marneuli district of Georgia. She takes all effort in the welfare of her children, who are school-aged and need much to get a good education. 

Svetlana can't find a stable job in spite of her high level of education. She had started a trading business and sells various kinds of soft and carbonated drinks. The income, however, isn't enough for a family of three to deal with all financial difficulties and satisfy basic needs. 

Svetlana has a great desire to start another profitable business activity. She requested a loan and received the credit in the framework of a joint initiative of Kiva and the Credo Startup Program, which gives rural poor people the chance to start or re-start businesses. 

Svetlana will purchase all merchandise and furniture needed to open a mini-restaurant at the good location. She will serve clients herself and hire a good cook, who will always make delicious food and attract customers. Svetlana's regular clients will be locals and passersby as well. 

This loan will be a great help to this hardworking woman, enabling her to increase her living conditions and give her children a good education to progress in life.

loans.use: To open a restaurant

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more cooking oil, rice and cooking seasonings to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase food containers, clothing,  and slippers to expand her business.

loans.name: Sharifan

texts.en:
Sharifan is a 42-year-old married woman. She has been running a business selling milk with her husband for the past 7 years. She has two cows, which she uses for milk selling to the people of her locality. 

Sharifan has become famous for providing good quality milk and makes enough to contribute to her family's income. She has gradually improved her business with the support of the Kashf Foundation. 

Currently she is in her third loan cycle, and has applied for a loan of PKR 40,000. This will allow her to purchase one more cow. 

Sharifan is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her and will bring positive changes to her business.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow.

loans.name: Fatma

texts.en:
Fatma has three children. She sells slippers from home and on the street. She also works for a cleaning company. Her husband has a three-wheel bike. He travels the streets on his bike to make sales. 

Their minimal wage is only enough to cover the rent and the bills. They support themselves with the money they earn from selling slippers. Life is hard for them. They can't accumulate any savings, because no money is left over from the money they earn. 

She will buy different kinds of slippers with this loan, so that she can make more sales and earn more money.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 
Fatma Hanım’ın 3 çocuğu var.  Evde ve sokakta  terlik satışı yapıyor.  Kendisi,temizlik şirketi elemanı.  Eşinin 3 tekerlekli bisikleti var.  Bununla mahalleleri,sokakları gezerek satış yapıyor.  3 çocuklu,kirada oturuyor.  Askari ücret kira ve elektrik su vs faturalarına gidiyor.  Yaptığı bu işle geçimini sağlıyor.  Hayat zor diyor.  Kazandığımız harcanıyor.  Sermayeye ihtiyacımız oluyor.  Bu iyi oldu.  Aldığı bu kredi ile daha çok mal alacak.  Terlik çeşitimi çoğaltıp,daha çok para kazanacam.

loans.use: to buy different kinds of slippers

loans.name: Rasheeda

texts.en:
Rasheeda is a 54-year-old married woman. She has been running a small food stall where she sells potato fries and ‘samosa’, which is a fried or baked pastry with a savory filling, such as spiced potatoes, onions, peas, lentils or chicken.  She is an expert in making good tasting samosa, and earns enough through this business to contribute in the family income.

In order to inflate her sales, she needs to purchase packs of flour, oil, salt and spices so she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied a loan of 45,000 PKR.

She is in her sixth loan cycle with a good repayment history. She wishes to spend part of the revenue on providing a better standard of living to her family members.

loans.use: to purchase packs of flour, oil, salt and spices.

loans.name: Sajida

texts.en:
Sajida is a 34-year-old married lady; she has been running a small general store in her community for many years.  She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price, and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. She makes enough to provide for her family. 

To make her store fully stocked, she requested a loan of 40,000 PKR, which she will use to buy a stock of rice, sugar and flour from the market at lower rates. In this way she would be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. 

Sajida wishes to utilize part of her revenues to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy a stock of rice, sugar and flour.

loans.name: Fehroza

texts.en:
Fehroza, age 47, is a married woman.  She deals in a business selling animals. She buys animals (baby goats & calves) at low prices, brings them up and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute in the family income. 

She needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase more animals. 

She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level. 

She is in her third loan cycle with a good credit history.

loans.use: to purchase more animals.

loans.name: Tahira

texts.en:
Tahira, age 53, is a married woman.  She deals in a business selling animals. She buys baby goats at low prices, brings them up, and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. She needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. 

For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied a loan of PKR 45,000 to purchase more baby goats. 

She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level. 

She is in her seventh loan cycle with a good credit history.

loans.use: to purchase more baby goats.

loans.name: Haleema

texts.en:
Haleema has been successfully running a small general store with her husband (also shown in the photo) for many years. Her husband also assists her by purchasing stocks of goods from the market and dealing with customers by sitting at the shop. Over the time they have become popular in their community for providing good quality products and make enough to meet the expenses of their four children. 

Currently, she requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to buy packs of salts, biscuits, grains and beverages to meet the increasing demand at her store. 

She is expecting a boost in their earnings, and dreams of expanding their business in the future.

loans.use: to buy packs of salts, biscuits, grains and beverages.

loans.name: Teresa Aracely

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Rostro de Jesús se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Miraflores  en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Teresa, tiene 40 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cuatro hijos de 17, 16, 10  y 8 años, los mayores estudian en colegio y los menores en escuela. El marido es albañil. 
Doña Teresa con la finalidad de contar con sus propios ingresos y con esto cubrir los gastos de estudios de sus hijos y del hogar se dedica a la venta de productos por catálogos de Avon (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas), trabaja todos los días más que todo en las horas de la mañana ya que a esas horas le resulta más fácil realizar sus recorridos, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, deja a crédito y  cobra semanalmente, se dedica a este negocio desde hace 10 años y gracias a sus ganancias salen adelante. 
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar perfumes, bisutería, cosméticos, cremas y otros productos. Lleva tres ciclos en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le ayudan mucho. Sus sueños es que sus hijos terminen sus estudios y sean buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
The credit group “Rostro de Jesús” meets every 2 weeks in Miraflores, a neighborhood in the city of Manta. The city is known for its beautiful beaches, popular all year long. The city’s beauty has no equal, and it has many tourist attractions.

This is where Teresa lives. She is 40 years old and lives in a common-law marriage, from which she has four children aged 17, 16, 10, and 8. The oldest attend high school, and the youngest attend grade school. Her partner is a construction worker.

In order to earn her own income to pay for her children’s education and the household’s expenses, Dona Teresa sells products from the Avon catalog (beauty products, cosmetics, perfume, and accessories for women). She works door-to-door every day, and mostly in the morning, because that is when it is easiest to make her rounds. She sells products on credit and collects payments each week. She has worked in this business for 10 years, and has advanced her family thanks to her earnings.

She will use this loan to buy perfumes, costume jewelry, cosmetics, creams, and other products. She has had three loans in the credit group, and she likes the group because the loans help her a lot. Her dream is that her children finish school and become successful professionals.

loans.use: to buy perfume, costume jewelry, cosmetics, creams, and other products.

loans.name: Geyler

texts.es:
Geyler vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, ciudad calida y llena de atractivos turísticos y sobre todo us pobladores son personas amables. Geyler día a día se esfuerza por salir adelante, es por ello que se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 4 años, especialmente en el cultivo de cacao, lo que le permite tener ingresos para podr solventar los gastos de su hogar y salir adelante.

Geyler esta agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá brindar mantenimiento al cultivo, asimismo podrá comprar abono, fertilizantes, entre otros; de esta manera podrá tener una mejor cosecha y poder mejorar sus ingresos, así podrá seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Dar una mejor calidad de vida para su familia”.
texts.en:
Geyler lives in the city of Pucallpa, a warm city that is full of tourist attractions. Above all, the residents are friendly people.
