Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: taller de bordados, venta de golosinas, tienda de carnicería, tejido de mantas, venta de comida, venta de condimentos.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Sofía es integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una promotora de la institución que fue a su zona y formo un grupo. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de  venta de condimentos; da a conocer que este negocio inicio hace varios años atrás, al observar que estos productos eran altamente comercializados. 
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de condimentos por mayor) que adquirirá de las ferias de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, ya que ella es casada libre y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud y las capacitaciones que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The "Amigas Por Siempre Unidas" [Friends Forever United] community bank will begin its first loan cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the regional hub of Juan Pablo. It is made up of eight members and led by a board of directors with Sofia as the president.

The businesses which the members of the community bank pursue vary and among them are: an embroidery shop, the sale of sweets, a butcher shop, blanket weaving, food sales and the sale of condiments.

The loan they will take out will benefit small business entrepreneurs, such as Sofia. She notes that this is her first time joining Pro Mujer. She joined at the invitation of a promoter from the institution who went to her area and formed a group. 

She currently has a business selling condiments. She opened this business several years ago when she observed that these products were very marketable.

The loan she now wants to take out is to increase her capital (purchasing condiments wholesale) which she will acquire from the street markets in the city of El Alto. She will then prepare and sell out of her place of business. This type of work allows her to generate funds to support her family since she is in a common law marriage and has three children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer she answers that she likes the health aspect and the workshops offered by the institution.

loans.use: to buy condiments wholesale.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN MARTIN DE ZURITE”; Este banco está ubicado en el Poblado de Zurite,  provincia de Anta y  departamento de Cusco.
La Sra. Marcelina, continua dedicándose a la agricultura y ganaderia,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia, la socia continua criando a su animalitos para luego venderlos en las distintas ferias que se realizan.
La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de una vaca.
La socia agradece el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus deudas de forma disciplinada
texts.en:
She is a member of the “SAN MARTIN DE ZURITE,” located in the village of Zurite, within the Anta province and the Cusco department.

Marcelina continues to farm and raise livestock.  She is a responsible and dedicated person who wants to continue to work this way and continue supporting her family.  She raises her livestock and sells them at the various fairs.

She is asking for this loan to buy a cow.

She is grateful for this loan and is committed to pay her debt with discipline.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Anastacio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SAN MARTIN DE ZURITE”; Este banco está ubicado en el Poblado de Zurite,  provincia de Anta y  departamento de Cusco.
El Sr. Anastasio, continua dedicándose a la agricultura y ganaderia,el socio lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a sus  negocios los cuales le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a cada uno de ellos, él socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para comprar alimentos para sus animales.
El socio valora y agradece el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus deudas de forma disciplinada.
texts.en:
Sr. Anastasio belongs to the Communal Bank “San Martin de Zurite” which is located in the village of Zurite in Anta Province, Department of Cusco. He continues to engage in agriculture and livestock breeding. Anastasio has been in this line of work for a long time and is doing very well thanks to the effort he puts forth day after day. He wants to keep working so that he can continue supporting his family.

Anastasio is requesting a loan so that he can buy feed for his animals. He values and appreciates the loan that has been issued, so he promises to complete his payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy animal feed.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
As the married parent of four children, Rebecca works hard to support her family.

She has a business buying and selling vegetables in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling bamboo. Rebecca is borrowing PHP 21,000 through NWTF to purchase more vegetables to sell for her business buying and selling vegetables.

Rebecca has been sustaining her business activities through her past 17 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more vegetables to sell

loans.name: Luz

texts.es: Gracias por apoyar a Luz, pues con su credikiva pudo comprar materias primas e insumos y hasta mercancia variada, con las que aumentó las ventas y crecieron sus utilidades. Desde que recibió su credikiva ha tenido mas liquidéz, su capital de trabajo se ha incrementado vendiendo mucha mercancia ya elaborada. Luz dice a sus financiadores: " Muchas Gracias, por apoyarme en mi trabajo, Dios los siga bendiciendo." En la actualidad Luz esta aplicando a un nuevo financiamiento, para comprar  articulos para bebé, ropa, calzado, juguetes, colonias y dos vitrinas . Su inversión será exitosa, pues cuenta con una clientela fija y ubicada en una via peatonal y vehicular muy comercial, que potencializa sus ventas.
texts.en:
Thanks for supporting Luz, since she was able to use her Kiva loan to purchase materials, supplies, and a variety of merchandise, which she used to increase her sales and grow her profits.  Since she received her Kiva loan, she has had more liquidity and her working capital has increased since she has sold a lot of already made merchandise.  Luz says to her lenders: "Thank you for supporting me in my work.  God will continue to bless you."  

Currently, Luz is requesting a new loan to purchase baby items, clothing, shoes, toys, cologne, and two display cases.  Her investment will be successful because she has a set customer base and she is located on a street with pedestrian and vehicular traffic, which are all potential sales.

loans.use: to purchase baby items, clothing, shoes, toys, cologne, and two display cases.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 51 years old, married, and has eight children, four of whom attend school. She works very hard to provide for them. Jocelyn operates a general store in the Philippines, which she has been doing for three years. 

Jocelyn requested a loan from NWTF for 12,000 PHP, which she will use to buy items such as shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: José Marío

texts.es:
José tiene 35 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado, está casado y tiene 2 hijos.

José junto a su esposa se dedican a la agricultura, oficio que aprendió de su padre, trabaja durante la mañana y su esposa le ayuda hasta mediodía y en la tarde él trabaja en otras parcelas sembrando y su esposa ordeña las vacas y realiza los oficios domésticos. José se levanta a las 4:30 AM Junto a su esposa  que le apoya en la actividades agrícolas durante la mañana y sus hijos van a la escuela.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar los insumos agrícolas (abono, semillas, veneno, alquiler de tierra,etc.) para sembrar y de la producción podrá obtener ingresos para su familia

él desea comprar una yunta de bueyes para arar la tierra que siembra y arar otras parcelas para obtener otro ingreso adicional.
texts.en:
José is 35 years old. He attended school until the sixth grade. He is married with two children.

José and his wife make a living with agriculture, which he learned from his father. He works during the morning and his wife helps him until noon. In the afternoon, he farms other plots while his wife cares for the cows and performs domestic duties. José wakes up at 4:30 am with his wife, who helps him with the agricultural duties during the morning, and his children attend school.

He needs the loan to purchase agricultural supplies (fertilizer, seeds, pesticides) and rent land for his crops so that he can earn money from the harvest to support his family.

He hopes to purchase a pair of oxen to plow the land that he farms and to plow other plots to earn additional money.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies (fertilizer, seeds, pesticides) and rent land for his crops.

loans.name: Sí, Sí, Sí Group

texts.es: Cleyde tiene 42 años de edad es casada. Ella implemento una pequeña librería en su vivienda con el cual ha podido apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de su hogar. El crédito lo invertira en la compra de una vitrina exhibidora en donde podrá exhibir mejor sus productos. Su mayor deseo es ampliar su librería con la venta de juguetes. En el grupos “Sí, Sí, Sí,” cumple la función de presidenta. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado. Cleyde es la segunda del lado derecho viste chompa negra y polo marrón.
texts.en:
Cleyde is 42 years old and is married. She started a small bookstore in her house with which she has been able to support her husband with the household expenses. She will invest the loan in the purchase of an exhibition display case where she will be able to better exhibit her products. 

Her greatest desire is to broaden her bookstore with the sale of toys. In the group Si, Si, Si, she fulfills the function of president. The group thanks the Kiva investors for the loan provided. Cleyde is the second from the left side wearing a black sweater and brown t-shirt.

loans.use: to buy a display case.

loans.name: Rossa

texts.fr:
Madame  Rossa dame âgée de 53 ans, elle est veuve et actuellement elle prend en charge ses 04 enfants dont 02 garçons et fille. C’est une femme d’une volonté et détermination sans faille. Elle s’active dans la vente de divers produits : huile de palm, jus de citron, fruits de mère et aussi des porcs qu’elle achète pour la revente dans un pays frontalier. Elle jouit d’une grande expérience dans cette Activité pour l’avoir pratiqué pendant plusieurs années.

Avec ce prêt elle compte acheter 05 porcs  de 50 000 F CFA pour la revente.

Les bénéfices de son activité lui permettront d’épargner d’une part et  d’assurer la prise en charge de sa famille surtout tous les plans.
texts.en:
Rossa is a 53-year-old woman who is a widow and currently supporting her 4 children, two girls and two boys. She is a woman with unfailing will and determination.

Rossa is in the business of selling various products: palm oil, lemon juice, seafood, and also pigs which she buys for resale in a neighboring country. She enjoys a large amount of experience in this business after having been in this line of work for several years. 

With this loan, Rossa plans to purchase 5 pigs at 50,000 francs CFA for resale. The proceeds of her business will allow her to save and to guarantee the support of her family above all else.

loans.use: to purchase 5 pigs at 50,000 francs CFA to resell

loans.name: Loriphen

texts.en:
Loriphen helps her husband on their farm, raising pigs to sell. For more than two years, she has earned well, aside from her husband's income from their transportation services business. Her previous loan, used to buy feed, was successfully repaid. 

Recently, Loriphen took a new loan to purchase piglets as piggery improvement. She plans to improve the business in order to provide a better living for her family in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase piglets.

location.town: Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
Alice is married and has two children. She lives in  Tukuran, Zamboanga Del Sur. She opened a grocery store in their village to make a living, which she has been doing for more than six years. 

To improve sales, Alice requested another loan, which she will use to purchase additional grocery items to sell. She hopes to develop her business to have a better future.

loans.use: to purchase additional grocery items to sell

loans.name: Marbelly Del Socorro

texts.es:
Con un beso cálido y un abrazo amoroso, despide Marbelly a su hijo antes que su papá lo lleve a clases. Su pequeño es la razón por la que hace dos años inicio el negocio de la pulpería, para poder brindarle mejores condiciones de vida a través de las ganancias. Ella tiene 36 años de edad y está en unión libre. Todo inicio con la venta de golosinas, poco a poco, más productos se fueron agregando a la lista y al mismo tiempo más clientela, quienes agradecen la buena atención que reciben. Su compañero de vida es su mano derecha.
Ella solicita el crédito para aumentar la producción de capital, requiere comprar granos básicos, productos lácteos, productos de limpieza, golosinas, gaseosas, refrescos, entre otros. Ella confía en el financiamiento, puesto que le ayudaran a incrementar las ventas y ganancias. Marbelly, es fanática de las reposterías, una de sus metas es establecer un puesto de venta y así tener otra fuente de ingresos. Sus planes son seguir trabajando, para mejorar su negocio, ampliarlo y darlo a conocer en otras comunidades. Definitivamente, es una mujer emprendedora y con deseos de superación.
texts.en:
With a warm kiss and a loving hug, Marbelly says goodbye to her son before his dad takes him to class. Her little one is the reason that two years ago she started the small grocery store business, to increase his quality of life through her earnings. She is 36 years old and in a common law marriage. Everything started with the sale of candy, and little by little, more products were added to the list and, at the same time, her clientele, who appreciate the great attention they receive. Her partner is her right hand man.

She requests this loan to increase the production of capital. She needs to buy basic grains, dairy products, cleaning products, candy, sodas, and drinks, among other things. She trusts in financing, which will help her increase her sales and earnings. Marbelly is a fan of bakeries, and one of her goals is to open one in order to have another source of income. Her plans are to keep working to improve her business, expand it, and make it known in other communities. Definitely, she is an entrepreneurial woman with dreams to better herself.

loans.use: to buy basic grans, dairy products, cleaning products, candy, sodas, drinks, among other things

loans.name: Zaibul Nisa

texts.en:
Zaibul Nisa is a 46-year-old married woman; she lives with her nine children and spouse in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her son has been working as a laborer in a small firm for daily wages. He is the sole earner for the entire family. His income was very low, so he has decided to change the source of his income by opening an electrician's shop. He has been learning about and troubleshooting electrical components such as water pumps and fans. Now he has become very expert in his profession and can conduct the full affairs of an electrician’s shop. 

Zaibul Nisa wants to buy the initial stock to set up the newly opened shop for her son. This is the reason she contacted Kiva's field partner BRAC Pakistan, so her son can buy initial stock such as sockets, bulbs, tube lights, switches and electrical goods.

Zaibul Nisa hopes the Kiva lenders will feel a warm participation to help her. She is very thankful to Kiva, Kiva's lenders and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy initial stock to set up a newly opened electrician's shop.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen tiene 61 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado, está soltera y tiene 2 hijos.

Ella se dedica a la agricultura, se levanta a las 4:30 AM  para realizar sus actividades diarias, el oficio lo aprendió de sus padres, durante la mañana trabaja y contrata mozos que le ayudan en la parcela que alquila. 	

El crédito solicitado lo necesita para comprar una novilla la cual en un futuro le ayudará a obtener más leche e incrementar sus ingresos para su sustento.

Carmen planea que con los ingresos que obtiene de venta de la leche  y  de la siembra, y del préstamo para la compra de la novilla podrá comprar en un futuro mas animales.
texts.en:
Carmen is 61 years old and studied up to the sixth grade. She is single and has two children. She makes a living in agriculture, getting up at 4:30 am to do her daily tasks. She learned this work from her parents. In the morning she works and hires young men to help her on the plot of land that she rents. 	

She needs the loan she is asking for to buy a heifer, which will help her to obtain more milk in the future and increase her earnings for her livelihood. With the income she obtains from selling milk, planting and the loan to buy the heifer, Carmen plans to be able to buy more animals in the future.

loans.use: to buy a heifer

loans.name: Anwar

texts.en:
Anwar is 54 years old and lives with her spouse and seven children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She is a responsible mother; her children have reached the age of marriage. She wants to make some savings so that she can provide better living facilities for her children, but it seems impossible in the absence of a profitable source of income.

Her three sons have been driving auto rickshaws for many years; their income is sufficient to feed the entire family. The body of the rickshaw of one of her sons needs maintenance, but he does not have sufficient money to fix the problem. Therefore, Anwar has requested a loan from Kiva's field partner BRAC Pakistan so that her son can buy an auto rickshaw body. 

Anwar hopes that she will be able to save enough money until the time of their marriages. She thanks Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to help her son buy a rickshaw body.

loans.name: Zahida

texts.en:
Zahida is a 48-year-old married woman residing in Lahore, Pakistan. She is the mother of three children and her husband is a motorcycle mechanic by profession. He has been running a motorbike repair workshop in the market, where he performs his services. He has also spare parts in the workshop to use in repairs. 

Zahida's husband needs to purchase some equipment for his workshop. This will help him to continue his work and to work more efficiently and professionally. He does not have enough funds to purchase the needed things. Therefore Zahida has requested a loan from Kiva's field partner BRAC Pakistan with the goal of helping her husband. This loan will help him to buy workshop items like tires, tubes, axles and brake shoes. 

Zahida is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy workshop items like tires, tubes, axles, and brake shoes
